full_summary:
#### GRADE and Systematic Review Experts Workshops and Methodological Advice
### Tender Notice

#### Title and Reference

* **Title**: GRADE and Systematic Review Experts Workshops and Methodological Advice
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01011170
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: 1000241413
* **Publication Date**: October 25, 2022

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Status**: Closed
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 24, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

#### Background and Objective

Health Canada is seeking a contractor to provide GRADE (Grading of Recommendations Assessment, Development and Evaluations) training to Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) employees. The contractor will also provide consulting services related to methods used by teams and draft updates to existing guidelines.

#### Specifications and Requirements

* Conduct GRADE training for PHAC employees
* Provide consulting services related to methods used by teams
* Draft updates to existing guidelines

#### Tender Documents

Please refer to the following documents for additional information:
* [English Final GRADE RFP][1]
* [French Final GRADE RFP][2]

[1]: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/25/af2698598c1c217040beebb31b92ba5e/1000241413_final_grade_rfp_en.pdf
[2]: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/25/aae41a31a8ddb8388456debf43260311/1000241413_final_grade_rfp_fr.pdf

#### Contact Information

Drew Johnson
Email: drew.johnson@hc-sc.gc.ca
Phone: 613-941-2102
